newsitem.title: RUSSIA: OSCE withdraws from Grozny - embassy.
newsitem.headline: OSCE withdraws from Grozny - embassy.

text.p: The Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe's (OSCE) mission has withdrawn from the Chechen capital, a Swiss diplomat said.

"The mission temporarily moved out from Grozny due to the ultimatum, but it definitely will stay in the region to carry out its duties," said Olaf Kjelsen. The OSCE's Grozny mission is headed by Swiss diplomat Tim Guldimann.
